plugins.name: Example Plugin
plugins.description: A basic example plugin demonstrating the structure and capabilities of RusherHacks plugins.

plugins.name: 2b2t.vc Rusherhack
plugins.description: 2b2t data and statistics API commands and HUD.

plugins.name: RusherHack-HudElement
plugins.description: Create a customizable HUD element for Minecraft utility mod RusherHack.

plugins.name: Auto Anvil Rename
plugins.description: Automates the renaming process in anvils.

plugins.name: Queue Manager
plugins.description: Manages queue positions and notifies users of their status.

plugins.name: RusherHack Instance Info
plugins.description: Provides detailed information about the current instance.

plugins.name: Stash Mover Plugin
plugins.description: A plugin to move stashes using pearls.

plugins.name: Combined Bind List
plugins.description: Hud Element to display keybinds and active modules from both Meteor and Rusher, with advanced customization options, including the ability to modify individual modules, metadata, brackets, colors, and other.

plugins.name: EFlyAutoJump
plugins.description: Enhances Baritone elytra flight with smart auto-jump start/stop and visual display, compatible with Xaero Plus "Baritone Elytra Here", also supports manual Baritone commands input in addition to automation.

plugins.name: Unified Module List
plugins.description: Rusherhack HUD element that shows active modules from both meteorclient and rusherhack.

plugins.name: Container Tweaks
plugins.description: Simple tweaks for quickly moving items in containers.

plugins.name: RusherHack Spotify Integration
plugins.description: Integrates Spotify music playback controls and status into the RusherHacks client.

plugins.name: Vanilla Elytra Flight
plugins.description: Highly customizable rusher hack elytra flight plugin.

plugins.name: Rusherhack BookBot
plugins.description: Rusherhack plugin for bookbot.

plugins.name: Shay's RusherTweaks
plugins.description: A collection of small tweaks and improvements for the RusherHacks client.

plugins.name: Nuker
plugins.description: Epic nuker for nuking terrain.

plugins.name: Hold Rusher
plugins.description: Adds a "Hold" flag for all modules, if active keybind will only be toggled while held.

plugins.name: No Walk Animation
plugins.description: Removes the walking animation.

plugins.name: NBT Utils
plugins.description: Rusher nbt paste and copy.

plugins.name: Rusherhack Executer
plugins.description: Executes commands and resolves `<player>` to every player online.

plugins.name: F3 Spoof
plugins.description: Spoofs the F3 debug screen information.

plugins.name: Open Folder
plugins.description: Opens the folder for the module with a button click.

plugins.name: Mace Kill
plugins.description: One shot pretty much all mobs with a mace.

plugins.name: Weather Changing Plugin
plugins.description: Allows players to change the weather in-game.

plugins.name: Middleclick Wind Charge
plugins.description: Allows you to throw windcharges with the middle mouse button and also jump at the same time so you can boost jump.

plugins.name: GarlicSight
plugins.description: A RusherHacks Plugin - Crosshair Info - GarlicSight.

plugins.name: LightningPop
plugins.description: A RusherHacks Plugin - Spawns Lightning On Totem Pops And Player Deaths - LightningPop.

plugins.name: AutoBucket
plugins.description: A RusherHacks Plugin - Auto Bucket Entities - AutoBucket.

plugins.name: RusherHack-BoatExecute
plugins.description: A RusherHack module plugin for 1.20.4 that exploits boat movement packets to instantly kill all passengers.

plugins.name: NBT Viewer
plugins.description: A plugin to view NBT data in Minecraft.

plugins.name: Remote Control
plugins.description: A plugin for remote controlling RusherHacks.

plugins.name: Speed Measure
plugins.description: A plugin to measure speed in RusherHacks.

plugins.name: TNT Bomber
plugins.description: A plugin to automate TNT bombing in Minecraft.

plugins.name: No Render Entities
plugins.description: A plugin to disable rendering of entities.

plugins.name: RusherHack Messenger
plugins.description: A messaging plugin for RusherHacks.

plugins.name: RusherHack Instance Info (Fork)
plugins.description: A forked version of the [original plugin](https://github.com/John200410/rusherhack-instance-info) with custom settings.

plugins.name: RusherHack NoteBot
plugins.description: A RusherHacks plugin for playing note blocks in Minecraft.

plugins.name: ShulkerViewer
plugins.description: A RusherHacks plugin to view the contents of Shulker boxes in the inventory.

plugins.name: RusherWebPlugin
plugins.description: Web Browser for rh.

plugins.name: UpdatedNCPEfly
plugins.description: A plugin for an updated version of NCPEfly.

plugins.name: dc-chat-logger
plugins.description: A plugin for logging chat messages to discord.

plugins.name: rusherhack-nightvision-plugin
plugins.description: A replacement for FullBright when using shaders.

plugins.name: AutoNetherite
plugins.description: A plugin that automates the process of upgrading gear to Netherite in Minecraft.

plugins.name: OldSignsPlugin
plugins.description: A plugin that brings back old sign functionalities in Minecraft.

plugins.name: StashHunter-rusherhack
plugins.description: A plugin to help locate stashes in Minecraft using RusherHack.

plugins.name: rusher-elytra-eta
plugins.description: A rusherhack plugin that allows you to see the ETA of all Elytras in the player's inventory.

plugins.name: rusher-silent-close
plugins.description: Keeps Container GUI open

plugins.name: rusherhack-addons
plugins.description: A collection of RusherHacks addons including:

plugins.name: rusher-gtranslate
plugins.description: A plugin that integrates Google Translate into RusherHack for translating chat messages.

plugins.name: rusher-matrix-nofall
plugins.description: No Fall by setting isFalling flag in movement packets to false (tested on 6b6t).

plugins.name: rusher-autoportal
plugins.description: Automatically breaks blocks to place obsidian and activate the nether portal.

plugins.name: rusher-air-place
plugins.description: A plugin that allows placing blocks in the air in Minecraft.

plugins.name: rusher-hold-spamm-space
plugins.description: A plugin that automatically spams or holds the space bar.

plugins.name: rusher-auto-bed-bomber
plugins.description: A plugin that automates bed bombing in Minecraft.

plugins.name: rusher-crystal-spin
plugins.description: A plugin that makes end crystals spin faster or slower.

plugins.name: AutoShear
plugins.description: A plugin that automates shearing in Minecraft.

plugins.name: rusher-autokit
plugins.description: A plugin that automatically equips your preferred kit.

plugins.name: AutoTorch
plugins.description: Automatically places torches to light up areas in Minecraft.

plugins.name: Elytra Swap
plugins.description: Automatically swaps fully repaired Elytras with damaged ones for efficient XP farm repairs.

plugins.name: HDisabler
plugins.description: 2b2t fast bypass.

plugins.name: CoordFollower
plugins.description: A plugin that allows you to save, manage, and follow coordinates with ease.

plugins.name: Rusher Chess TUI
plugins.description: Chess module for RusherHacks, powered by [ChessLib](https://github.com/bhlangonijr/chesslib).

plugins.name: ActivatedSpawnerDetector
plugins.description: Detects activated spawners and provides visual feedback in RusherHacks.

plugins.name: Rusher Discord Notifications
plugins.description: Sends notifications from RusherHacks to a Discord channel.

plugins.name: AutoBonemeal
plugins.description: A RusherHacks plugin for automatically applying bonemeal to crops.

plugins.name: Rocket3
plugins.description: A RusherHacks plugin for crafting duration 3 rockets.

plugins.name: GarlicBreeder
plugins.description: A RusherHacks plugin that automates the breeding of mobs in Minecraft.

plugins.name: Rusher Item Saver
plugins.description: A RusherHacks plugin that saves items from being lost.

plugins.name: RusherHack Mace Swap
plugins.description: A RusherHacks plugin that automatically swaps to a mace when attacking.

plugins.name: Example Core Plugin
plugins.description: A core plugin example demonstrating mixin support in RusherHack.

plugins.name: CrystalModifierRH
plugins.description: A plugin for modifying the rendering of end crystals in Minecraft using mixins in RusherHack.

plugins.name: Tablist Hats
plugins.description: Enables hat layer rendering for player heads on the tablist, even if the player isn't in render distance.

plugins.name: NoSound
plugins.description: A core plugin that disables specific in-game sounds in RusherHack.

plugins.name: Rusherhack Streamer Mode
plugins.description: A core plugin for spoofing player coordinates in RusherHack.

plugins.name: Rusher Auto Item Frame Dupe
plugins.description: A plugin for automating item frame duplication in RusherHack.

plugins.name: RusherMoji
plugins.description: A core plugin for adding custom emoji functionality in RusherHack.

plugins.name: RusherHack Piston Pusher
plugins.description: A plugin that automates pushing end crystals with pistons to attack players in RusherHack.

plugins.name: RusherUtils
plugins.description: RusherUtils automates Wither and TNT tasks with HUD counters for RusherHack.

plugins.name: Rusher Grown ESP
plugins.description: ESP plugin for RusherHack that highlights grown crops and useful farm blocks.

plugins.name: Rusher GhoulMode
plugins.description: Allows you to stay in the world after death. The death screen is suppressed, and you can still look around without interacting.

plugins.name: Rusher AutoAnvil
plugins.description: A basic AutoAnvil with airplace. Bypasses 2b2t (very good).

plugins.name: Rusher BurrowESP
plugins.description: A module that shows blocks that a player is burrowed into.

plugins.name: Rusherhack-SignFilter
plugins.description: A plugin for Rusherhack to filter out unwanted/inappropriate sign messages.

plugins.name: Rusher-Vault-Helper
plugins.description: Marks vaults for you and can play a sound when you render a vault.

plugins.name: Rusher-Inventory-Drag
plugins.description: Allows you to drag items in your inventory while holding shift.

plugins.name: PlayerLogPlugin-RusherHack
plugins.description: Rusherhack plugin that logs all player encounters in a log file and displays them in the chat.

plugins.name: BarrierESP-RusherHack
plugins.description: Rusherhack plugin that lets the player see barrier blocks as if holding one.

plugins.name: FovLimiter-Rusherhack
plugins.description: Limit the FOV multiplier between a max and min value.

plugins.name: NoJumpDelay-Rusherhack
plugins.description: Set the delay between jumps when holding the space key.

plugins.name: HideNightVision-RusherHack
plugins.description: Rusherhack plugin that hides the night vision effect on the HUD.

plugins.name: rusherhack-kybes-utils
plugins.description: encrypted chat (CryptoChat) with key management and chunking, auto-mock/quote/reply with regex filters, death-message reactions, random sentence/whisper, and a new in-game User Info window (column view).

screenshots.alt: Example chat messages from kybe's utils

plugins.name: AutoAnvilRename
plugins.description: A fork of the AutoAnvilRename plugin that automates item renaming in anvils. Includes features like predefined rename text, ID filtering, shulker-only mode, and configurable click delay.

plugins.name: rusher-auto-kit-maker
plugins.description: Automatically builds kits inside shulkers.

plugins.name: rusherhack-shell-integration
plugins.description: Provides Linux shell integration for RusherHack, including an in-game terminal, command HUD, and support for triggering commands from external scripts.

plugins.name: rusherhack-SmartBounce
plugins.description: Automatically adjusts the player's pitch during Elytra bouncing to smoothly jump over 1-block obstacles and return to optimal pitch afterward.

plugins.name: AutoRegear
plugins.description: Automatically equips a saved kit from a chest, matching items and enchantments with configurable sensitivity. Includes commands for saving, renaming, listing, and removing kits.

plugins.name: rusherhack-rusherman
plugins.description: Plugin package manager for RusherHack that helps install and manage plugins from a single place.

plugins.name: rusherhack-instantloader
plugins.description: Automatically interacts with a targeted trapdoor as soon as a specified player logs in, enabling instant pearl loading.

plugins.name: rusher-waifu-integration
plugins.description: Allows adding any custom image to the RusherHack HUD.

plugins.name: AutoMoss
plugins.description: Automatic moss spreading with configurable settings. • Range, cooldown, delay, and max uses per tick • Optional rotation to face target blocks • Optional tree growth support (azaleas, saplings, leaves) • Option to restrict bone meal usage to inventory or hotbar only

plugins.name: AutoIgnorehard
plugins.description: Automatically runs the `/ignorehard <playername>` command on any player that sends a Discord invite in chat.

plugins.name: Cockpit
plugins.description: Adds a cockpit HUD to display flight distance and time when using an elytra. Great for players who frequently travel the nether highways while AFK.

plugins.name: ChatFilter
plugins.description: Allows you to filter chat messages in Minecraft using customizable regular expressions. It reads expressions from a file and applies them to incoming chat messages, blocking those that match.

plugins.name: rusherhack-ai-integration
plugins.description: Adds AI integration to RusherHack with configurable API, token, and model options. Supports DeepSeek and other APIs with streaming-enabled chat completions.

plugins.name: Elytra Trajectories
plugins.description: Renders predicted flight paths for Elytra.

plugins.name: AutoReload
plugins.description: Automatically reloads RusherHack whenever changes are detected in the plugins directory.

plugins.name: hw-efly-tweaks
plugins.description: Enhances ElytraFly automation by intelligently managing wall-hugging movement. Automatically adjusts flight direction, detects obstacles, and maintains elevation using Baritone-assisted pathing and visual block rendering.

plugins.name: icaemas-tweaks
plugins.description: Adds keybinds for quick equipment and inventory management. • Toggle between Elytra and chestplate, with auto-deploy when falling • Swap hotbar slots with the row above in the inventory

plugins.name: AutoFirework
plugins.description: Automatically uses fireworks to redeploy Elytra flight when speed drops below a specified value.

plugins.name: AutoMend
plugins.description: Automatically cycles damaged Mending items to repair with XP - swaps items into offhand or equips elytra in chest, can limit to elytras only, temporarily disables AutoTotem/AutoArmor while mending and restores them, and auto-disables when finished.

plugins.name: Stopwatch
plugins.description: Stopwatch HUD with lap support and a control module; can auto-start on join and optionally hide when zero.

plugins.name: RusherHack Speedometer
plugins.description: Adds customizable speed HUD elements including a speed readout with unit conversions (e.g., miles/hour, bananas/second, lightyears/year) and a Mach meter displaying speed relative to the speed of sound.

plugins.name: Example Chatbot
plugins.description: Example chat automation module that listens to public chat and whispers.

plugins.name: StartupSound
plugins.description: Plays a custom `.ogg` sound on RusherHack startup. Supports selecting a specific file or choosing a random sound from `rusherhack/startupsounds`.

plugins.name: Polar Spiral EFly
plugins.description: Overworld AFK Elytra flight that flies in a smooth polar spiral pattern for basehunting.

themes.name: Nhack Theme
themes.description: A theme like Nhack 2015 for RH.

themes.name: RusherGUI
themes.description: An example plugin showcasing how to create custom themes with RusherHack.
